channel.title: Changing:xp rate (based source deltascape aka ddspec) help plz
channel.description: hi, guys my server having a big new update with all kinds of stuff going on. easter event, char file reset, new commands, new client, and new "XP RATE" problem:I dont know how to change "XP RATE" if you can help, please help. ok i try to make this a good statement so dont make fun on me please. thanks, owner of moon-space.

item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Search exprate in your client class.
